ngokuhambisana: Imigqa emibili endaweni enezinhlangothi ezimbili engahlangani
indiza: Indawo eyisicaba enezinhlangothi ezimbili lapho kungalala khona izinto ezinezinhlangothi ezimbili
iphuzu: Indawo ethile emugqeni, endizeni, noma emkhathini
ohlangothini: Amasegimenti omugqa ngezibalo zejiyomethri ezihlanganisa ingaphandle lento
i-vertex: Iphuzu lapho izinhlangothi ezimbili zesibalo esinezinhlangothi ezimbili zihlangana khona
isiyingi: Umumo wezinhlangothi ezimbili lapho wonke amaphuzu akumugqa ogobile alingana ukusuka endaweni emaphakathi
unxande: Isibalo esinezinhlangothi ezimbili, esivaliwe, esinezinhlangothi ezine esinama-engeli amane angakwesokudla
isikwele: Uhlobo olukhethekile lukanxande olunezinhlangothi ezilinganayo nezinhlangothi eziphambene ezihambisanayo
ikhiyubhu: Isibalo esinezinhlangothi ezintathu ezinezikwele ezifanayo ezilinganayo njengobuso
